mapper.select: /* 회원 아이디에 따른 등급별 혜택 조회 */ SELECT b.seller_grade_num , b.grade_type , b.seller_ad_discount , g.member_id FROM seller_standard_benefit AS b INNER JOIN seller_grade AS g ON b.seller_grade_num = g.seller_grade_num WHERE g.member_id = #{memberId};

/* 광고 진행중 or 완료 조회 */ SELECT a.ad_apply_code , a.ad_price_code , a.member_id , a.ad_apply_title , a.ad_cate , a.ad_contract_price , a.ad_apply_date , a.ad_start_date , a.ad_end_date , a.ad_contract_term , a.ad_goods_url , a.ad_content , a.ad_img , a.ad_permit_state , a.manager_id , a.ad_permit_date FROM ad_apply_permit AS a WHERE a.ad_permit_state = '결제완료' OR a.ad_permit_state = '광고중' OR a.ad_permit_state = '광고완료' ORDER BY cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.ad_apply_code,'_',-1) AS UNSIGNED) ASC;

/* 광고 신청 코드별 정보 조회 */ SELECT a.ad_apply_code , a.ad_price_code , a.member_id , a.ad_apply_title , a.ad_cate , a.ad_contract_price , a.ad_apply_date , a.ad_start_date , a.ad_end_date , a.ad_contract_term , a.ad_goods_url , a.ad_content , a.ad_img , a.ad_permit_state , a.manager_id , a.ad_permit_date FROM ad_apply_permit AS a WHERE a.ad_apply_code = #{adApplyCode};
/* 광고 단가 코드별 상세 정보 조회 */ SELECT a.ad_price_code ,a.ad_cate ,a.ad_price_per_day ,a.member_id FROM ad_price AS a WHERE a.ad_price_code=#{adPriceCode};
mapper.update: /* 광고 단가 수정 */ UPDATE ad_price AS a SET a.ad_cate=#{adCate}, a.ad_price_per_day = #{adPricePerDay}, a.update_manager_id = #{updateManagerId}, a.last_update_time = CURDATE() WHERE a.ad_price_code = #{adPriceCode};
